functions.name: exists
functions.description: Returns boolean true if an item with the given fileName exists inside the directory named like the extensionId. If a fileName is not provided, returns true if the directory named like the given extensionId exists.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the item to check for existence. If provided, must be a valid file name. If not provided, checks if the directory named like the given extensionId exists.

functions.name: isRegularFile
functions.description: Returns a boolean true if an item with the given fileName exists inside the directory named like the extensionId and is a Regular File, not a Directory.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to check for existence and type. Must be a valid file name.

functions.name: isDirectory
functions.description: Returns boolean true if an item with the given directoryName exists inside the directory named like the extensionId and is a Directory, not a Regular File. If a directoryName is not provided, checks if a file named like the extensionId exists and is a Directory.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: directoryName
parameters.description: The name of the directory to check for existence and type. If provided, must be a valid file name. If not provided, checks if an item named like the extensionId exists and is a Directory.

functions.name: hasFiles
functions.description: Returns boolean true if an item with the given directoryName exists inside the directory named like the extensionId, is a Directory, and contains files. If a directoryName is not provided, checks if an item named like the extensionId exists, is a Directory, and contains files and/or directories.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: directoryName
parameters.description: The name of the Directory to check. If provided, must be a valid file name. If not provided, checks the Directory named like the extensionId.

functions.name: getFileCount
functions.description: Returns a count of files and/or directories if an item with the given directoryName exists inside the directory named like the extensionId and is a Directory. If a directoryName is not provided, returns a count of files and/or directories if an item named like the extensionId exists and is a Directory.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: directoryName
parameters.description: The name of the Directory to to get a count for. If provided, must be a valid file name. If not provided, get a count for the Directory named like the extensionId.

functions.name: writeFile
functions.description: Writes the data with UTF-8 encoding into file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to write. Must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to write.

parameters.name: writeMode
parameters.description: Default is 'overwrite'. If 'overwrite', replace any existing file. 'replace' is a synonym for 'overwrite'. 'append' appends to the end of an exiting file which must already exist. 'appendOrCreate' appends to the end of any existing file or creates a new file. 'create' creates a new file which must not already exist.

functions.name: replaceFile
functions.description: Writes the data with UTF-8 encoding into file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId, replacing any existing file if it already exists. (This is the same as writeFile() with writeMode = 'replace'.)

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to write. Must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to write.

functions.name: appendToFile
functions.description: Appends the data with UTF-8 encoding to the end of file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId, or creates a new file if it oes not exist. (This is the same as writeFile() with writeMode = 'appendOrCreate'.)

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to write. Must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to write.

functions.name: writeJSONFile
functions.description: Writes JSON data with UTF-8 encoding into the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to write. Must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: The JSON string to write as JSON.

parameters.name: writeMode
parameters.description: Default is 'overwrite'. If 'overwrite', replace any existing file. 'replace' is a synonym for 'overwrite'. 'append' appends to the end of an exiting file which must already exist. 'appendOrCreate' appends to the end of any existing file or creates a new file. 'create' creates a new file which must not already exist.

functions.name: writeObjectToJSONFile
functions.description: Formats the given JavaScript object to JSON and writes the result into the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to write. Must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: The JavaScript object to write as JSON. (It will be validated to make sure it is a object.)

parameters.name: writeMode
parameters.description: Default is 'overwrite'. If 'overwrite', replace any existing file. 'replace' is a synonym for 'overwrite'. 'create' creates a new file which must not already exist.

functions.name: readFile
functions.description: Reads a data with UTF-8 encoding from the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to read. Must be a valid file name. The file must exist and be a Regular File, not a Directory.

functions.name: readJSONFile
functions.description: Read the JSON data with UTF-8 encoding from the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to read. Must be a valid file name. The file must exist and be a Regular File, not a Directory.

functions.name: readObjectFromJSONFile
functions.description: Read the JSON data with UTF-8 encoding from the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId, convert it into a JavaScript object, and return the result.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to read. Must be a valid file name. The file must exist and be a Regular File, not a Directory.

functions.name: getFileInfo
functions.description: Return the FileInfo for the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId. If a fileName is not provided, get the FileInfo for the directory named like the given extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to get the FileInfo for. If provided, must be a valid file name. If not provided, get the FileInfo for the directory named like the given extensionId.

functions.name: renameFile
functions.description: Rename the file with the given fromFileName to the given toFileName.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fromFileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to rename. It must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: toFileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to rename the file to. It must be a valid file name.

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: If overwrite is not provided, or if it is provided and its value is false, and the file named by toFileName already exists, an Exception is thrown.

functions.name: deleteFile
functions.description: Deletes the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to delete. Must be a valid file name. The file must be a Regular FIle, not a Directory.

functions.name: deleteDirectory
functions.description: Deletes the sub-directory with the given directoryName from inside the directory named like the extensionId. If a directoryName is not provided, delete the directory named like the given extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: directoryName
parameters.description: The name of the directory to delete. If provided, must be a valid directory name. If not provided, delete the directory named like the given extensionId. Must be a Directory, not Regular File.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Optional. Default is false. If true, the named directory and all its contents - including directories and sub-directories - will be deleted. If false, and the directory contains file, throws an error.

functions.name: makeDirectory
functions.description: Creates the extension's directory - a directory named like the extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the Directory will be created. Must be a valid Extension ID.

functions.name: listFiles
functions.description: Returns an array of the names of for only Regular Files inside the directory named like the extensionId. If the optional matchGLOB GLOB string is provided, any files whose file names do not match the GLOB will be excluded.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: matchGLOB
parameters.description: A GLOB string that will be used to filter the files by file name.

functions.name: listFileInfo
functions.description: Returns an array of the FileInfo for only the Regular Files inside the directory named like the extensionId. If the optional matchGLOB GLOB string is provided, any files whose file names do not match the GLOB will be excluded.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: matchGLOB
parameters.description: A GLOB string that will be used to filter the files by file name.

functions.name: list
functions.description: Returns an array of the names of the items (all types) inside the directory named like the extensionId. If the optional matchGLOB GLOB string is provided, any files whose file names do not match the GLOB will be excluded.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: matchGLOB
parameters.description: A GLOB string that will be used to filter the items by name.

functions.name: listInfo
functions.description: Returns an array of the FileInfo for the items (all types) inside the directory named like the extensionId. If the optional matchGLOB GLOB string is provided, any files whose file names do not match the GLOB will be excluded.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: matchGLOB
parameters.description: A GLOB string that will be used to filter the items by name.

functions.name: getFullPathName
functions.description: Returns the full pathanme of the file with the given fileName inside the directory named like the extensionId. If a fileName is not provided, returns the full pathname for the directory named like the given extensionId.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file to get the full pathname for. If provided, must be a valid file name. If not provided, returns the full pathname for the directory named like the given extensionId.

functions.name: isValidFileName
functions.description: Returns true if the given fileName is valid, false if not.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the File to to test the vailidity of.

functions.name: isValidDirectoryName
functions.description: Returns true if the given directoryName is valid, false if not.

parameters.name: directoryName
parameters.description: The name of the Directory to to test the vailidity of.

functions.name: getFileSystemPathName
functions.description: Returns the full pathName of the system directory on which this API operates.

functions.name: stats
functions.description: Returns a JavaScript object that provides information about the directory named like the given extensionId and its contents.

parameters.name: extensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the extension for which the operation will be performed. Must be a valid Extension ID.

includeChildInfo.description: Optional. If true, include information for each child item in the directory named like the extensionId.

types.description: Optional. If includeChildInfo is true, which item types -- 'regular', 'directory', 'other', 'unknown', 'error' -- to include. The default is all types.

functions.name: fsbListInfo
functions.description: Returns an array of the FileInfo for the items (types optionally selected by parameters.types) inside the top-level directory in which this extension operates. If the optional parameter.matchGLOB GLOB is provided, any files whose file names do not match the GLOB will be excluded.

matchGLOB.description: Optional. A GLOB string that will be used to filter the items by name.

types.description: Optional. Which item types -- 'regular', 'directory', 'other' -- to include. The default is all types.

functions.name: fsbList
functions.description: Returns an array of info (name & type) for the items (types optionally selected by parameters.types) inside the top-level directory in which this extension operates. If the optional parameter.matchGLOB GLOB is provided, any files whose file names do not match the GLOB will be excluded.

matchGLOB.description: Optional. A GLOB string that will be used to filter the items by name.

types.description: Optional. Which item types -- 'regular', 'directory', 'other' -- to include. The default is all types.

functions.name: fsbStats
functions.description: Returns an Object that provides information about each directory inside the top-level directory in which this extension operates.

functions.name: fsbDeleteDirectory
functions.description: Deletes the directory with the given directoryName.

parameters.name: directoryName
parameters.description: The name of the directory to delete. It must be a valid directory name. Must be a Directory, not  Regular File.

recursive.description: Optional. Default is false. If true, the named directory and all its contents - including directories and sub-directories - will be deleted. If false, and the directory contains any items, throws an error.
